verbs.description: [ARG0: AT&T] [V: says] [ARG1: its top Washington executive , Robert Quinn , is retiring after what the company called a reputation - damaging and mistaken hiring of President Donald Trump ’s personal lawyer , Michael Cohen] .

AT&T says its top Washington executive , Robert Quinn , [V: is] retiring after what the company called a reputation - damaging and mistaken hiring of President Donald Trump ’s personal lawyer , Michael Cohen .

AT&T says [ARG0: its top Washington executive , Robert Quinn ,] is [V: retiring] [ARGM-TMP: after what the company called a reputation - damaging and mistaken hiring of President Donald Trump ’s personal lawyer , Michael Cohen] .

AT&T says its top Washington executive , Robert Quinn , is retiring after [ARG1: what] [ARG0: the company] [V: called] [ARG2: a reputation - damaging and mistaken hiring of President Donald Trump ’s personal lawyer , Michael Cohen] .
